content: अर्थवत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Wealthy, rich; <ls>R. 14. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Significant, full of sense or meaning; अर्थवान् खलु मे राजशब्दः <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 136</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 51.</ls> {@--3@} Having meaning; अर्थवदधातुरप्रत्ययः प्रातिपदिकं <ls>P. I. 2. 45.</ls> {@--4@} Serving some purpose; successful, useful; स पुमानर्थवज्जन्मा <ls>Ki. 11. 62</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">10. 62.</ls> {%--<ab>adv.</ab>%} According to a purpose. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (--वान्) A man.
